review: We love the chromecast! It is so convenient and works very well on our Iphones, iPads, Android and computers!+ You can cast Netflix through it, using your phone, youtube of course and many other apps.+ You can cast entire tabs from Chrome browser. This is awesome because you can watch videos in Chrome and then cast the tab to your chromecast, and watch it on your TV.+ For $30 I think this is one of my favorite purchases of the year.+ More and more services and apps are being added to be used with Chromecast+ Minimal software installation (Chrome browser or chromecast library)+ HDMI+ so easy to plug :)+ compactThis is definitely a nice gift for christmas, birthdays, etc.

review: We haven't had cable for 3-4 years now since we just used the Wii, Xbox or our Playstation to watch on Netflix, Amazon or Hulu.  But this thing makes it so much easier, smaller, takes no space and we can drag it along with our PICO 3 projector any where.  Fully recommend and will be buying 2 more for the living room and for my parents.
